name: 04-Model Training And Evaluation
content:
Model Training and Validation

Model Used:

  • Linear Optimization Model â selected to minimize geographic distance while maximizing call success rate and signal quality.

Features Used:

  • Distance_to_Neighbor
  • Dropped_Calls, Successful_Calls
  • Signal_Strength
  • Network_Load
  • Derived ratios (e.g., success rate, weighted connectivity score).

Feature Importance:

  • Determined by optimization weights and contribution to prediction accuracy:
  • Connectivity success ratio (strongest predictor).
  • Distance (closer towers preferred, all else equal).
  • Signal strength and load (key factors in final decision).

Model Metrics:

  • Precision & Recall: Evaluate accuracy of selecting the correct fallback tower.
  • Mean Squared Error (MSE): Difference between predicted and actual diversion outcomes.
  • Call Success Rate Improvement: Key KPI measuring improvement after diversion.

Validation Strategy:

  • Train/test split (e.g., 80/20).
  • Simulated outage scenarios tested with prediction outcomes.
  • Comparison against baseline heuristic (nearest tower only).
